description: A martial arts style based on an old children's series about robots with military-grade armaments. This particular style is highly aggressive, relying on dodging and stunning enemies.

static_buffs.name: Electrical Claws
static_buffs.description: Your energy runs through you, causing your attacks to become stronger with your ability to focus and making you move and dodge faster, but reducing your ability to block strikes.

static_buffs.name: Rending Claws
static_buffs.description: Your fingers have become able to part through armor and bone alike thanks to your inner focus.

ondodge_buffs.name: Counter Chance
ondodge_buffs.description:
Your foe left an opening!

Move into a better position.
Lasts for 1 turn.

onmove_buffs.name: Feint
onmove_buffs.description: You move, baiting your foe into striking.

description: A rather esoteric style of fighting said to be primarily practiced by a tribe of Chinese Amazons, Amazonian Bludgeoning is an extremely offensive style focused on hitting hard and charging your opponent at the cost of defense.
initiate: You ready your weapon and prepare to lunge.

static_buffs.name: Raging Strikes
static_buffs.description: You dedicate your entire body to offense and charging forwards, refusing to stop until either you or your enemy is dead.

onmove_buffs.name: Charge
onmove_buffs.description: You charge forwards, seeking to end the fight as quickly as possible.
